snippet.title: Fade Memory - Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Fade memory official announce trailer

Steampage (ADD TO WISHLIST) -https://store.steampowered.com/app/2221990?utm_source=youtube

Fade Memory is a 2D adventure game in the genre of psychological thriller with detective elements.

Take on the role of a lonely hero named Ethan, whose mental and physical health is deteriorating every day due to very strange dreams.

Soundtrack: Chalz Moore - https://vk.com/chalzmoore

#indiegames #gamedev #indiegame #2dgame
 #gameart #madewithunity #franbow #sallyface #nitw #tinybuny #littlemisfortube #animation #trailer #steam
